name: Piri Piri Chicken Dip 🥩
description: Dip into a world of bold, zesty flavor with piri-piri chicken dip, where succulent chicken meets the fiery kick of piri-piri sauce. This tantalizing concoction is sure to ignite a flame of passion for all things spicy.
instructions: Fry the chicken in a little oil for a few minutes until cooked through.
Stir in the cream cheese until it’s melted.
Stir in the piri piri sauce.
Transfer all of this to an oven-safe dish and top with grated cheese.
Grill (broil) for 5 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly.
Serve with a selection of crackers.
